Name: Passion Flower
Description: Gentle yet profound, this flower is cooling to the body, calming to the mind, and soothing to the spirit.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Suave pero profunda, esta flor refresca el cuerpo, calma la mente y tranquiliza al espíritu.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 조용하고 고상한 이 꽃은 몸을 차분해지고 마음을 진정시켜 정신을 맑게 해줍니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Sanft und doch tief, kühlt diese Blume den Körper, beruhigt den Geist und beruhigt den Geist.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 「Gentle yet profound, this flower is cooling to the body, calming to the mind, and soothing to the spirit.」
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Suave, mas profunda. Sim, esta flor lhe esfria, acalmando a sua mente e suavizando seu espírito.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 温柔而深沉，这朵花能让人放松身心，抚慰自己的心灵。
